## âœ… Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please check all items:

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any console.log statements or debugging code
- [ ] My code passes all linting checks (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] My code passes TypeScript type checking (`npm run type-check`)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments where appropriate

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers/devices (if UI changes)

### Dependencies
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked for and resolved any dependency conflicts
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
